item.title: MATLAB Tutorial (Persian)
item.description: This PDF files is prepared by Erfan Karimian from Najafabad branch of Islamic Azad University. Chapter 01 - Starting with MATLAB. Chapter 02 - Creating Arrays. Chapter 03 - Mathematical Operations with Arrays. Chapter 04 - Using Script Files and Managing Data. Chapter 05 - Two-Dimensional Plots. Chapter 06 - Programming in MATLAB. Chapter 07 - User-Defined Functions and Function Files. Chapter 08 - Polynomials, Curve Fitting, and Interpolation.
